name: GCR Tire Centres
tag_list: truck-tires, all-season-tires, quebec-winter-tires, performance-tires, pneu-hiver, pneus-quebec, centre-pneu, pneus-blizzak
overview:
GCR Tire Centres is the retail division of Bridgestone. There are currently 48 stores in Quebec, Newfoundland, Nova Scotia, New Brunswick and Ontario.

We offer a wide range of superior tire brands from the world’s leading manufacturers including Bridgestone, Firestone, associated brands and Hankook tires. Our tire inventories include passenger and light trucks tires, large trucks, Agriculture and forestry, Industrial products and OTR tires. Whether night or day, rain or shine, our emergency road assistance is at your service.

GCR teammates are trained and certified to ensure that our customers are well taken care of. Our proven commitment to provide the service you need and premium quality tires is the key to our success and competitiveness over the years.

If you are looking for all season tires, performance tires, Quebec winter tires or mechanical work to be done or simply wish to inquire about our products, GCR will be more than happy to help you find what you are looking for. See our Store locator to find the retail store closest to you.
